name: LIV: VIVR
detailed_description:
VIVR will be discontinued and integrated into the LIV Client soon

VIVR is the #1 simplest way to calibrate cameras for mixed reality.

• Tool for mixed reality presentation
• Fast Mixed Reality Calibration (3 easy steps)
• Automatic Camera Latency Detection
• Works with VIVE and Rift!
• Calibration can be exported right into LIV!
about_the_game:
VIVR will be discontinued and integrated into the LIV Client soon

VIVR is the #1 simplest way to calibrate cameras for mixed reality.

• Tool for mixed reality presentation
• Fast Mixed Reality Calibration (3 easy steps)
• Automatic Camera Latency Detection
• Works with VIVE and Rift!
• Calibration can be exported right into LIV!
short_description: VIVR is the #1 simplest way to calibrate cameras for mixed reality. Mixed reality is the best method to demonstrate what it is like for people to be in virtual reality!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
